patthana9.14:1.1: Nokilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanokilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.14:2.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.14:3.1: Nasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.14:4.1: Nasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.14:5.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.14:6.1: Nakilesasampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakilesavippayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.14:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.14:8.1: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkilesikañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkilesikañceva nano ca kilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.14:9.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana9.14:10.1_0: Nakilesañceva naasaṅkiliṭṭhañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naasaṅkiliṭṭhañceva
patthana9.14:10.1_1: nano ca kilesaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakilesañceva nakilesavippayuttañca
patthana9.14:10.1_2: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nakilesavippayuttañceva nano ca kilesaṁ nakusalaṁ
patthana9.14:11.1_0: Kilesavippayuttaṁ nasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… kilesavippayuttaṁ
patthana9.14:11.1_1: naasaṅkilesikaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe
